effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   [Catches]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon without fail.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

flavor_text_entries.text:
野生の　ポケモンを　必ず
捕まえることが　できる
最高　性能の　ボール。

The best Poké Ball with the ultimate
level of performance. With it, you will
catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

La Poké Ball dalle prestazioni migliori:
cattura qualsiasi Pokémon selvatico senza
mai fallire.

La Poké Ball definitiva. Atrapa cualquier Pokémon
salvaje y no falla nunca.

Der beste Ball! Damit fängst du garantiert jedes
wilde Pokémon.

Assurément la Ball la plus performante.
Elle permet de capturer à coup sûr un Pokémon
sauvage.

야생 포켓몬을 반드시
잡을 수 있는
최고 성능의 볼.

やせいの　ポケモンを　かならず
つかまえることが　できる
さいこう　せいのうの　ボール。

The best Ball with the ultimate level of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

The best Ball with the ultimate level of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

Assurément la Ball la plus performante.
Elle permet de capturer à coup sûr un
Pokémon sauvage.

The best Ball with the ultimate level of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

The best Ball with the ultimate level of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

The best Ball with the ultimate level of
performance. It will catch any wild
Pokémon without fail.

The best BALL with the ultimate
performance. It will catch any wild
POKéMON without fail.

The best BALL that
catches a POKéMON
without fail.

without fail.
